original_title: Harry Connick, Jr.: The New York Big Band Concert
overview: The New York Big Band Concert is a live performance DVD with Harry Connick, Jr. and his big band.  Songs Include: Sweet Georgia Brown, Don't Get Around Much Anymore, Recipe for Love, Bare Necessities, They Can't Take That Away from Me, You Didn't Know Me When, He Is They Are, With Imagination, We are in Love, It Had to Be You, Just Kiss Me, All of Me
title: Harry Connick, Jr.: The New York Big Band Concert
